name: Nursing
description: Clinical nursing practice, patient care, and healthcare delivery

questions.question_text: Describe your approach to patient assessment and prioritizing care in a high-acuity setting.
questions.expected_answer: Should cover systematic assessment (ABCDE), triage principles, and documentation

questions.question_text: How do you handle medication administration errors and what steps do you take to prevent them?
questions.expected_answer: Reporting, root cause analysis, five rights of medication administration

questions.question_text: Explain the principles of infection control in a hospital ward.
questions.expected_answer: Hand hygiene, PPE, isolation precautions, sterilization protocols

questions.question_text: Tell me about a time you advocated for a patient's needs against institutional pressure.
questions.expected_answer: Demonstrates patient advocacy, ethical reasoning, and professional communication

questions.question_text: How do you manage pain assessment in non-verbal patients?
questions.expected_answer: FLACC scale, behavioral cues, physiological indicators

questions.question_text: Describe your experience with electronic health records and clinical documentation.
questions.expected_answer: Familiarity with EHR systems, accurate documentation, HIPAA compliance

questions.question_text: How would you handle a situation where a family member is interfering with patient care?
questions.expected_answer: De-escalation, communication, involving charge nurse if needed

questions.question_text: What is your understanding of evidence-based practice in nursing?
questions.expected_answer: Research integration, clinical guidelines, continuous learning

questions.question_text: Describe your experience with wound care assessment and management.
questions.expected_answer: Wound classification, treatment options, documentation, healing stages

questions.question_text: How do you maintain work-life balance and prevent burnout in a demanding nursing role?
questions.expected_answer: Self-care strategies, support systems, professional boundaries

questions.question_text: Explain the nursing process and how you apply it in daily practice.
questions.expected_answer: Assessment, diagnosis, planning, implementation, evaluation (ADPIE)

questions.question_text: How do you handle end-of-life care discussions with patients and families?
questions.expected_answer: Compassionate communication, advance directives, palliative care principles

questions.question_text: Describe a quality improvement project you have participated in.
questions.expected_answer: PDSA cycle, data collection, measurable outcomes

questions.question_text: What are the key considerations when administering blood products?
questions.expected_answer: Blood type verification, consent, monitoring for reactions, documentation

questions.question_text: How do you educate patients about their discharge medications and care plan?
questions.expected_answer: Teach-back method, written instructions, follow-up planning

questions.question_text: Describe your experience working in a multidisciplinary team.
questions.expected_answer: Collaboration, communication, role understanding, conflict resolution

questions.question_text: How do you respond to a rapid deterioration in a patient's condition?
questions.expected_answer: ABCDE assessment, calling rapid response, escalation protocols

questions.question_text: What are the ethical principles that guide your nursing practice?
questions.expected_answer: Autonomy, beneficence, non-maleficence, justice, fidelity

questions.question_text: How do you stay current with the latest nursing practices and guidelines?
questions.expected_answer: Continuing education, journals, conferences, professional organizations

questions.question_text: Explain your approach to fall prevention in elderly patients.
questions.expected_answer: Risk assessment tools, environmental modifications, patient education

questions.question_text: How would you handle a disagreement with a physician about a patient's care plan?
questions.expected_answer: Professional communication, evidence presentation, chain of command

questions.question_text: Describe your experience with IV therapy and central line management.
questions.expected_answer: Insertion techniques, maintenance, CLABSI prevention, troubleshooting

questions.question_text: What strategies do you use for managing patients with chronic conditions?
questions.expected_answer: Care plans, self-management support, coordination of care

questions.question_text: How do you ensure cultural sensitivity in patient care?
questions.expected_answer: Cultural assessment, interpreter services, respectful communication

questions.question_text: Describe the steps you take during a code blue situation.
questions.expected_answer: BLS/ACLS protocols, team roles, defibrillation, medication administration
